main event: A bright flash of light was observed in the sky over Rangoon, Burma on March 5, 1965.
interesting points: The flash of light was described as 'brilliant' and light blue in color.
The flash of light lasted for 5-10 seconds and lit up the area around the witnesses.
After the flash, a bright white streak was observed in the sky for 5-10 seconds.
The witnesses thought the incident might have been an exploding comet.
The sighting was reported by a civilian and a Japanese diplomat.
